analysis.description:
ItemMarket.TakePrize (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#135-155) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > TimingTarget (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#150-155)

ItemMarket.BuyItem (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#155-214) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- UsedItem.owner != address(0) && block.timestamp > (add(UsedItem.timestamp,UsedItem.timer)) (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#158-166)
	- require(bool)(msg.value >= UsedItem.price) (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#166-168)
	- require(bool)(msg.sender != UsedItem.owner) (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#169-170)

ItemMarket.add (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(c >= a) (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_fee' of ItemMarket.ChangeFee (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#61) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newPrice' of ItemMarket.ChangeItemPrice (/unique_contracts/0xf73c97245b3be2559d01343bffaa3e3a69f6dd3b.sol#65-68) is not in mixedCase
